name: Photon Torpedoes
description: Standard matter/antimatter torpedoes of the 23rdâ€“24th century; solid against both shields and hull.

name: Quantum Torpedoes
description: Advanced torpedo with zero-point energy warhead; more effective against hull than shields.

name: Torpedoes (standard)
description: General-purpose projectile used by multiple factions; balanced performance.

name: Phaser Array
description: Long-range beam weapon; good sustained damage against shields, less on hull.

name: Phaser Cannons
description: High-intensity phasers for close-range combat; fast recharge but short range.

name: Disruptor Arrays
description: Romulan and Klingon beam weapons; very effective against shields but weaker on hull.

name: Disruptor Cannons
description: Rapid-fire, high-energy disruptors; brutal against shields but hull penetration is limited.

name: Disruptors
description: Generic disruptor emitters; faction staple, shield-shredding.

name: Large Disruptor
description: Heavy disruptor cannons; devastating alpha strike against shields, moderate on hull.

name: Phased Polaron Beams
description: Dominion beam weapon; ignores a percentage of shield capacity before dealing damage.

name: Spatial Charges
description: Experimental Federation ordnance; massive area effect, huge shield impact but fragile casing.

name: Tricobalt Warheads
description: Extremely destructive; banned in the Federation; massive explosive yield against structures and ships.

name: Energy Dissipater
description: Special Breen weapon; disables power systems, reducing shield regeneration and weapon recharge.

name: Heavy Phaser Arrays
description: Advanced phaser systems capable of delivering sustained high-energy fire by drawing power from a powerful energy source.

name: Large Phaser Cannons
description: Oversied, high output pulse phaser cannons with a low firing rate, but powerful destructive force.

name: Mycelial Energy Projector
description: The Mycelial Energy Projector channels massive amounts of energy from the Mycelial Network to unleash a catastrophic beam capable of destroying a small moon. Luckily for you, it's currently not performing very well, but it's still unimaginably powerful.
